aggregateInputConfigs.name: binanceAuth
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Enter your binance API Key and API Secret.

aggregateInputConfigs.name: binanceTokenPool
aggregateInputConfigs.label: Trading Pair
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Enter the base (e.g. ETH) and quote (e.g. USDT) currency symbols for the pair you wish to trade.

aggregateInputConfigs.name: jsonRpcEndpoint
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: To communicate with a blockchain, you need an endpoint. For this bot you need a JSON RPC endoint URL with the access token embedded (Ankr provides free community endpoint URLs, one of which I've used here as a default).

aggregateInputConfigs.name: privateWalletKey
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Enter the private key of the wallet to trade with.

aggregateInputConfigs.name: evmTokenPool
aggregateInputConfigs.label: Token Pool
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Enter the contract address for the token you wish to trade and the currency that the token is pooled with (the quote currency). This can be "Native Token" which will resolve to ETH on Ethereum, BNB for Binance Smart chain, etc.).

aggregateInputConfigs.name: triggerPrice
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Enter the price trigger. This can be a percentage- append the % sign- which will be calculated when the script is running, or a price value. By default this is in the comparator (quote) currency. Prepend a $ sign to force fiat denomination. Examples: 0.5%, $0.5%, 0.000045, $2100

aggregateInputConfigs.name: orderType
aggregateInputConfigs.textUnderName: Specify the type of order to make.
